H0.text: A pickerel is a young what. Trout

H1.text: A pickerel is a young what. Salmon

H2.text: A pickerel is a young what. Walleye

H3.text: A pickerel is a young what. Pike

A4.text: Walleye, a fish unrelated to Esox, is called Pickerel in parts of Canada

A5.text: The English 'pike' originally referred specifically to the adult fish, the diminutive form 'pickerel' (now used to name some of the smaller pike species, e.g. E. americanus and E. niger) referring to the young

A6.text: The walleye (Sander vitreus) is sometimes called a pickerel or a walleyed pike, but it is unrelated to the pike, being a member of the perch family (Percidae)
